name: Chinese Zhu Ying
short_description:
czy is a program that annotates Chinese classical texts with
pronunciation.  In Chinese, this process is called Zhu4 Ying1.  czy
cannot compute the correct Zhu4 Ying1 perfectly, only recommendations. czy stands for Chinese Zhu4 Ying1.
